headline: 94 Percent of Business Leaders Say Outsourcing is Key to Workforce Transformation
summary: MANILA, Philippines, December 02, 2025--94 percent of business leaders say outsourcing plays a significant role in workforce transformation, and over half believe their competition is gaining competitive advantage by leveraging outsourcing and offshoring talent. And 67 percent say AI readiness is now a key differentiator when choosing an outsourcing partner.
